abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers defeat New York Islanders, 4-0; other hockey scores noted.

headline.print_headline: Flyers Blank Isles to Win 3rd in a Row
headline.main: Flyers Shut Out Islanders for Third Straight Win

snippet: Michael Raffl, Evgeny Medvedev, Matt Read and Sean Couturier scored to help Philadelphia beat the Islanders for the first time in three games this season.
lead_paragraph: Michael Raffl, Evgeny Medvedev, Matt Read and Sean Couturier scored to help Philadelphia beat the Islanders for the first time in three games this season.
